divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at a beach adjacent to the Atlantic ocean near a beachcalled Martinique beach about 30 miles from halifaxdartmouth.We felt a presence and looked up and there it was.I did not know what this object was. No noise. All Blue like a sparklingdiamond.Kim saw it first. then I looked and saw it also. I looked at it for about30 seconds then went to get my binoculars. As I tried to look in withmy binoculars it left just disappeared..It stood there hovering in silent and looking brilliant quite differentnever seen this type of color in my life. it was just beautiful to look at.It did not hurt the eyes. You could feel amazement while looking at it.It was the most beautiful thing I have ever seen.. It was very smooth of abluish color and looked more like a sparkling diamont in the shape of a teardropbut on its side.Kim kept looking at it. I went to reach for my binoculars and it justdisapeared.Shortly afterwards a what seemed to be an air force jet whizzed by..about
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Halifax
There were no other sightings in Halifax on or around July 10th 2003
Summary: a shining blue scintillating like a diamond above
